summary: This bill, HR 5534, aims to allow nationals of the Republic of Korea to apply for the E-3 nonimmigrant visa, currently available to Australians. It amends existing immigration law to include South Korea, specifies employer requirements, details application allocation, and sets an effective date. The bill mandates participation in the E-Verify program for employers of Korean visa holders and establishes a numerical cap on approved applicants based on the number of Australian visa approvals in the prior fiscal year.
